short_summary: Miscellaneous groceries supply for Department of National Defence and Coast Guard Canada
description: Supply of miscellaneous groceries for an as-on-request basis to Department of National Defence and Coast Guard Canada. Maximum of two Regional Master Standing Offers will be awarded.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

**RFESSO# EC095-230004 RMSO Miscellaneous Groceries 1st Period**

**Registration Information**
---------------------------

* **Reference Number**: WS3930634413-Doc3974488874
* **Amendment Number**: 3

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

* **Publication Date**: November 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Contract Period**: May 1, 2023 to May 31, 2024

**Procurement Category**
-------------------------

* **Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (RMSO)

**Targeted Locations**
----------------------

* **Canada**: Entire country
* **Provinces**: New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Labrador

**Solicitation Overview**
-------------------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence and Coast Guard Canada is seeking a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) to supply and deliver miscellaneous grocery items.

**Supply Requirements**
-----------------------

* **Short Description**: Miscellaneous grocery items to be supplied and delivered on an as-and-when-requested basis.
* **Delivery Zones**: Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Labrador, with deliveries required to both static kitchens and DND and CCG vessels.

**Evaluation Criteria**
-------------------------

* **Evaluation Method**: Lowest priced compliant bid (line by line evaluation).

**Eligibility Requirements**
-----------------------------

* **Eligibility**: Open bidding.
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Bidding Information**
-------------------------

* **Submission Deadline**: January 19, 2024 at 14:00:00.
* **Bidding Process**: Bid through the Ariba online platform.
* **Notice URL**: For details, visithttps://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16081396?extsite=MTYwODEzOTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Inquiries**
--------------

* **Inquiries**: Submit through the Ariba messaging tool.

**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A
